Package ohos.batterymanager

Class BatteryInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.batterymanager.BatteryInfo

  • public class BatteryInfo
extends Object
    Obtains battery information of a device.

    Battery information includes the remaining battery power, voltage, temperature, model, and charger type.

    Since:
    1

    • Field Detail

      • OHOS_BATTERY_CAPACITY

        public static final String OHOS_BATTERY_CAPACITY
        Indicates battery capacity.

        This constant is a keyword used to extract an integer variable from Intent.COMMON_EVENT_BATTERY_CHANGED. The integer variable contains the battery capacity.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OHOS_BATTERY_LOW

        public static final String OHOS_BATTERY_LOW
        Indicates the current battery power is low.

        This constant is a keyword used to extract a boolean variable from Intent.COMMON_EVENT_BATTERY_CHANGED. The boolean variable contains information about whether the battery power is low.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OHOS_BATTERY_PRESENT

        public static final String OHOS_BATTERY_PRESENT

    • Method Detail

      • getCapacity

        public int getCapacity​()
        Obtains the remaining battery power of a device.
        Returns:
        Returns the remaining battery power, for example, 55%.
        Since:
        1

      • getChargingStatus

        public BatteryInfo.BatteryChargeState getChargingStatus​()
        Obtains the battery charging status of a device.

        The battery charging status can be NONE, ENABLE, DISABLE, or FULL.

        Returns:
        Returns the battery charging status, for example, ENABLE.
        Since:
        1

      • getHealthStatus

        public BatteryInfo.BatteryHealthState getHealthStatus​()
        Obtains the battery health status of a device.

        The battery health status can be UNKNOWN, GOOD, OVERHEAT, VOLTAGE, COLD, or DEAD.

        Returns:
        Returns the battery health status, for example, OVERHEAT.
        Since:
        1

      • getPluggedType

        public BatteryInfo.BatteryPluggedType getPluggedType​()
        Obtains the charger type of a device.

        The charger type can be NONE, AC, USB, or WIRELESS.

        Returns:
        Returns the charger type, for example, AC.
        Since:
        1

      • getVoltage

        public int getVoltage​()
        Obtains the battery voltage (mV) of a device.
        Returns:
        Returns the battery voltage, for example, 3400 mV.
        Since:
        1

      • getPresent

        public boolean getPresent​()
        Checks whether the battery of a device is present.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the battery is present; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        5

      • getTechnology

        public String getTechnology​()
        Obtains the battery model of a device.
        Returns:
        Returns the battery model in character string format, for example, Li-poly.
        Since:
        1

      • getBatteryTemperature

        public int getBatteryTemperature​()
        Obtains the battery temperature (Celsius) of a device.
        Returns:
        Returns the battery temperature in 0.1 degrees Celsius, for example, 26.0 degrees Celsius.
        Since:
        1

      • getBatteryLevel

        public BatteryInfo.BatteryLevel getBatteryLevel​()
        Obtains the battery charge level of a device.

        The battery charge level can be NONE, HIGH, NORMAL, LOW, or EMERGENCY.

        Returns:
        Returns the battery charge level.
        Since:
        1
